thread.section_title: DiscoverCarHire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DiscoverCarHire | discovercarhire.com
thread.title: Martin S

author: Martin S
title: Martin S
text:
We rented a Jeep Cherokee at Discover Car Hire at Miami International Airport based on the fact that they had the best offer after extensive search.
Feedback after booking was efficient and my questions were promptly answered with a good description of where to Catch shuttle (off facility rental 5 minues away). What I missed as coming from abroad was information about toll additional fees. Check in was also a bit inefficient as the guy who handed over the car was also the shutle driver. Car was Clean and tidy and all according to booking specs. On and all I can recommend Discover Car Hire!
